oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Nashville Atlas, 1908
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Achieving Recognition
Medical profession
Maps
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A plat map of Nashville from the Atlas of the City of Nashville, 1908.
This plate shows the location of Meharry Medical College, Central Tennessee College, and Walden University, all African American universities.
